alert.note: Alert for Hickman (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 23 at 1:08AM CST until February 25 at 7:49PM CST by NWS Nashville
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Nashville TN has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Tennessee... Duck River At Centerville affecting Hickman County. For the Duck River...including Manchester, Shelbyville, Pottsville, Milltown, Columbia, Centerville, Hurricane Mills...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON TO FRIDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Duck River At Centerville. * WHEN...From this afternoon to Friday evening. * IMPACTS...At 25.0 feet, Flood waters cover the soccer fields and bottomland along the river. Hickman Springs Road, Defeated Creek Road, and Leatherwood Road will be impassable. Defeated Creek will flood due to backwater from the Duck River. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 12:00 AM CST Wednesday the stage was 17.1 feet and rising. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this afternoon to a crest of 24.9 feet early tomorrow afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage early Friday afternoon. - Flood stage is 22.0 feet. - Flood History...No available flood history. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this evening at 715 PM CST.
